title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4101 - Licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4101 - Licenses

State Regulations

Race Track Licenses (§ 4101.1 to 4101.8)

Financial Statements of Licensed Race Tracks (§ 4101.9 to 4101.14)

Statements and Reports of Concessionaires (§ 4101.16 to 4101.18)

Other Provisions (§ 4101.23 to 4101.41)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4101

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128, 210, 213, 241, 301, 307, 308, 309, 409, 906; L. 1940, ch. 254, § 36, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
